name: Slice It Down
description:
Slice It Down is a 2D rogue-lite game.
You will slaughter thousands of enemies, get new abilities and reveal new combo abilities, do not forget to improve your character, but for this you will need gold and of course you need to kill monsters to find gold. Meanwhile, do not hesitate to use the various weapons you find.

Let's see who will make the highest score

Beginner Tips

-Remember to dodge when hitting the enemy, you don't want to be a standing target.
-If you say"this game is too difficult", you haven't upgrade your character yet.
-Enlarging your weapon and hitting more enemies will give you some relief.
